translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人討伐隊……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Demon Subjugation Squad...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐひょひょひょ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Guhyohyohyo!'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さあ心の友！　とどめ！　とどめ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Come on, my comrade! Finish it! Finish it!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん、もはや何もできまい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Hmph, you can't do anything anymore.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今すぐラクに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just give up now...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あん？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Huh?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まだ、生きてるぜ、俺ァ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'I'm still alive...!'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 突如として、レイが身体を跳ね起こす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suddenly, Rei sprang to his feet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスに血の目潰しを浴びせかけ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He threw a blood-blinded strike at Rance,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マリアの戦車へと走る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then ran toward Maria's chariot.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ、きゃぁっ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Ah! Kyaa!?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マリアがそれに反応するより速く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Before Maria could respond,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 駈けのぼり、手刀で避雷針を切断する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he ran up and cut the lightning rod with a hand blade.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あーーーーーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Aaaaaaaaah!'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ッ、消し飛べ、ゴミどもッ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Die off, you trash...!'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ッ、総員！　逃げッ…………！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Everyone! Retreat...!'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 周辺全域に、特大の雷の雨が迸った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A massive rain of lightning surged throughout the surrounding area.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地を抉り、空を貫き、直撃した者を消し炭にし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It gouged the earth, pierced the sky, and reduced those struck directly to charcoal.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうでない者の耳を轟音が貫く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A deafening roar pierced the ears of those nearby.
(grunting sound)...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして躊躇いもなく身を翻し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And without hesitation, he turned around,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レイはその場から遁走した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Rei fled from the spot.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「げほごほっ……あ、あの野郎……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Cough, cough... that bastard...!'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ええい、追え追え追えーーーー！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Damn it, chase him, chase him, chase him—!!'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ラ、ランス様、大丈夫ですかっ……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'L-Lance-sama, are you okay...?!'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いたいのいたいの飛んでけー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Pain, pain, go away!'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちっ、ヒーリングよりタオル寄越せ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Tch, forget healing—hand me a towel!'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 野郎の血糊で目が開かん！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'My eyes won't open with that bastard's blood all over!'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、はい！　動かないでくださいね、ごしごし……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Y-yes! Please don't move, I'll wipe it off...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「レイの野郎、逃げおっただと！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'That bastard Rei escaped?!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれだけボロボロの身体で、まだ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Even with that battered body, he's still alive...!'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「全軍に伝えろ、魔人を探して捕まえろとな！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Tell the entire army: Find and capture the demon!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺にしか殺せんにしても……絶対に逃がすな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Even if only I can kill him... do not let him escape!'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「っ、分かったわ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'R-Right!'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人の敗北と共に通達されたその命は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That order, issued alongside the demon's defeat,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最優先で自由都市連合軍中に伝わり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was conveyed with highest priority throughout the Free Cities Alliance army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全軍はただちに追跡戦に入った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the entire force immediately began pursuit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ――セキガハラの戦い。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: —The Battle of Sekigahara.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍12万に対し人類軍7万で迎え撃ったこの決戦は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Facing 120,000 demon troops, the 70,000-strong human army stood their ground in this decisive battle,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類の圧勝で終わった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: which ended in a decisive victory for humanity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数では上回る魔軍に対し、軍師篠田源五郎は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Against the numerically superior demon army, strategist Gengorou Shinoda

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最後までその数を有効活用させず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: prevented them from effectively utilizing their numbers until the end,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 伏兵と陽動を用いて、敵中核の戦力を削り続けた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: using ambushes and feints, continuously wearing down the enemy’s core forces.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍4名、魔物隊長は200名あまりが討ち死にし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Four demon generals and over 200 demon captains were killed in action,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 5万を超える魔物兵が屍をさらした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and more than 50,000 demon soldiers lay dead.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物大将軍ピサロは逃走。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon grand general Pizarro fled.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人レイも、単独で人類軍の被害の4割近くを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Rei, too, single-handedly caused nearly 40% of the human army’s casualties

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちっ、ヒーリングよりタオル寄越せ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Tch, forget healing—hand me a towel!'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 野郎の血糊で目が開かん！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'My eyes won't open with that bastard's blood all over!'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、はい！　動かないでくださいね、ごしごし……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Y-yes! Please don't move, I'll wipe it off...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「レイの野郎、逃げおっただと！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'That bastard Rei escaped?!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれだけボロボロの身体で、まだ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Even with that battered body, he's still alive...!'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「全軍に伝えろ、魔人を探して捕まえろとな！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Tell the entire army: Find and capture the demon!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺にしか殺せんにしても……絶対に逃がすな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Even if only I can kill him... do not let him escape!'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「っ、分かったわ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'R-Right!'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人の敗北と共に通達されたその命は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That order, issued alongside the demon's defeat,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最優先で自由都市連合軍中に伝わり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was conveyed with highest priority throughout the Free Cities Alliance army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全軍はただちに追跡戦に入った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the entire force immediately began pursuit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ――セキガハラの戦い。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: —The Battle of Sekigahara.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍12万に対し人類軍7万で迎え撃ったこの決戦は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Facing 120,000 demon troops, the 70,000-strong human army stood their ground in this decisive battle,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類の圧勝で終わった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: which ended in a decisive victory for humanity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数では上回る魔軍に対し、軍師篠田源五郎は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Against the numerically superior demon army, strategist Gengorou Shinoda

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最後までその数を有効活用させず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: prevented them from effectively utilizing their numbers until the end,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 伏兵と陽動を用いて、敵中核の戦力を削り続けた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: using ambushes and feints, continuously wearing down the enemy’s core forces.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍4名、魔物隊長は200名あまりが討ち死にし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Four demon generals and over 200 demon captains were killed in action,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 5万を超える魔物兵が屍をさらした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and more than 50,000 demon soldiers lay dead.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物大将軍ピサロは逃走。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon grand general Pizarro fled.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人レイも、単独で人類軍の被害の4割近くを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Rei, too, single-handedly caused nearly 40% of the human army’s casualties
